channel.title: Html admin login
channel.description:
Hi I know some html as i am doing it for a school assignment and i was wondering if someone can help me out with just making An admin login in html Basically all i want is 1 person to be able to go Username: Admin Password: Admin And when i log in i wanna make it so i can change my words around like this code does for everyone and save it
Everyone can change this -.-

item.title: Html admin login
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“317guy, post:1, topic:456881”]Hi I know some html as i am doing it for a school assignment and i was wondering if someone can help me out with just making An admin login in html
Basically all i want is 1 person to be able to go
Username: Admin
Password: Admin
And when i log in i wanna make it so i can change my words around like
this code does for everyone and save it

Everyone can change this -.-
[/quote]

Your best bet is using a PHP script where you load the users from an array inside the script rather than loading them from a database, that will solve your login problem and make it easier so only you can set the username and password.

I’d then use a rich text editor found online somewhere for the editable content.

Here’s something that may be useful - http://woork.blogspot.co.uk/2009/02/best-rich-text-editors-ready-to-use-in.html

Read full topic
